welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Khotkovo, Russia! This charming city is known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chkalovsky Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Chkalovsky Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for various Russian airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines, including Aeroflot and SkyTeam alliance members.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, primarily serving international flights for Aeroflot and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: This terminal serves low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi for up to 4 hours by providing their personal information.
